TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MenuCommand extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 Windows 菜单项或工具栏命令项。

span.span: Represents a Windows menu or toolbar command item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示有关 Windows 菜单或工具栏命令的信息。The class represents information about a Windows menu or toolbar command. 接口允许您将对象添加 到 Visual Studio 菜单。The interface allows you to add objects to the Visual Studio menu. 此类提供以下成员：This class provides the following members: - 一个事件处理程序属性，可以将该命令的事件处理程序附加到此属性。An event-handler property to which you can attach an event handler for the command. - 唯一标识该命令的属性。A property that uniquely identifies the command. - 执行命令的方法。An method that executes the command. - 一个 可重写的方法，用于处理在选择新命令时发生的事件。An method that can be overridden to handle the event that occurs when a new command is selected. - 布尔标志状态，指示命令是、、 还是 。Boolean flag states that indicate whether the command is , , , or . - 一个 属性，该属性指示命令的 OLE 命令状态代码。An property that indicates the OLE command status code for the command. - 方法的重写 。An override for the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 对象，配置其属性，并将其添加到中 。The following code example creates a object, configures its properties, and adds it to the . 在 `Component1` 窗体上创建类的实例，并在 Visual Studio 之类的设计环境中打开窗体。Create an instance of the `Component1` class on your form and open the form in a design environment like Visual Studio. 按 F1 键调用 。Press the F1 key to invoke the . [!code-cpp[MenuCommand Example#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MenuCommand Example/CPP/component1.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[MenuCommand Example#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MenuCommand Example/CS/component1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[MenuCommand Example#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MenuCommand Example/VB/component1.vb#10)]

related.span: Windows 窗体的设计器命令和 DesignerAction 对象模型

span.span: Designer Commands and the DesignerAction Object Model for Windows Forms

span.span: An that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写时，请确保调用基类的 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 获取与 关联的公共属性。

span.span: Gets the public properties associated with the .
An containing the public properties of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有菜单命令都将其公共属性存储在 集合中。All menu commands store their public properties in the collection. 属性字典中的键是属性名称。The key in the properties dictionary is the property name. 这允许属性的泛型枚举，并提供一致的基底，无需修改类定义即可添加新属性。This allows for generic enumeration of properties and provides a consistent substrate from which new properties can be added without modifying the class definition.
